# ContractMetadata.update property

Update the metadata of a contract

## Example

```javascript
await contract.metadata.update({
  description: "My new contract description",
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript

            data: () => Promise<z.output<TSchema["output"]>>;
```

## Remarks

Update the metadata of a contract
